faq.contactText: Couldn't find the answer to your question?
faq.deliveryCostQuestion: How much is the delivery cost?
faq.deliveryCostAnswer: Delivery cost varies depending on the order quantity and address.
faq.howToOrderQuestion: How do I place an order?
faq.howToOrderAnswer: Orders are accepted either through the website, WhatsApp, or by phone call.
faq.deliveryTimeQuestion: How long does it take to deliver after placing an order?
faq.deliveryTimeAnswer: Orders are usually delivered within 24 hours. Delivery time may vary depending on the address, region, and other conditions.
faq.paymentMethodsAnswer: Cash, card, or online payment is possible.
faq.returnPolicyQuestion: Can products be returned or exchanged?
faq.returnPolicyAnswer: Due to food safety, opened products cannot be returned. However, in case of wrong or damaged products, replacement or refund is carried out if contacted within 24 hours.
